channel.title: bicycle on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in bicycle on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Laughing fits
item.description: A lot of people who know me think I am a pretty serious person. Maybe it’s because I have a tendency to intensify conversations. But as serious/intellectual/deep I get, I can go equally crazy.

item.title: LfE 19: Work and Tea
item.description: 22/02/2010 Hello everyone, It’s been a long time since I last wrote, partly because I’ve not been doing too much of new things – the project develops, and software glitches occur daily that I patiently overcome.
